display_name: Quality of Life (SHHS2): Felt down in the dumps
description: 9. These questions are about how you feel and how things have been with you during the past 4 weeks.  For each question, check the box for the one answer that comes closest to the way you have been feeling.  During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time. c. Have you felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer you up?

hybrid.LABEL: QL 9c  Down in dumps/cannot cheer up
